import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { Book } from '../models'; import { BookService } from '../services/book.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent { book!: Book param$!: Subscription bookId!: string comments!: string[] constructor(private ar: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router, private bookSvc: BookService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.param$ = this.ar.params.subscribe( (params) => { this.bookId = params['bookId'] console.log(this.bookId) this.bookSvc.getSingleBookById(this.bookId) .then(result => { console.log(result) this.book = result }).catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } ) } }
